statements.select:
select a.OldManId,a.OldManName,a.Gender,isnull(a.Tel,a.Mobile) as ContactPhone,a.Address,a.AreaId, isnull(b.BalanceOfGovernment,0) as BalanceOfGovernment, isnull(b.BalanceOfSelf,0) as BalanceOfSelf from Oca_OldManBaseInfo a left join Oca_Ewallet_OldMan b on a.OldManId=b.OldManId where a.Status=1 isnull(b.Status,1)=#Status# a.AreaId=#AreaId# isnull(b.AreaId,#AreaId#)=#AreaId# $WhereClause$
$OrderByClause$

select a.OldManId,a.OldManName,a.Gender,isnull(a.Tel,a.Mobile) as ContactPhone,a.Address,a.AreaId, b.RechargeItem,b.RechargeTime,b.RechargeAmount from Oca_OldManBaseInfo a inner join Oca_Ewallet_Recharge_Record b on b.RechargeObjectType='00001' and b.RechargeObject=a.OldManId where a.Status =1 b.Status=#Status# a.AreaId=#AreaId# isnull(b.AreaId,#AreaId#)=#AreaId# b.RechargeAccount=#RechargeAccount# $WhereClause$
$OrderByClause$
